The partnership announcement with @newbalance is BIG news if you ask me. Yes it's just a pilot for now, & details are sketchy at the moment, but the fact that a global brand like New Balance is even interested in Cardano is a huge win - especially before Shelley is even launched.

#Cardano and New Balance are partners. A chip will be built into shoes for authenticity purposes.   However, a token can also be created. The token can be used to ensure trust during online shopping. ADA for shoes.   https://t.co/Tc23KTbmzA  #blockchain $ada $btc $eth $eos $xrp
